remarks: The value of an operation class abstraction.  Compare ~ ovidi .  The condition ` ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) ` is been removed.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ovidig.1 $e |- E* z ph $.
ovidig.2 $e |- F = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } $.
ovidig $p |- ( ph -> ( x F y ) = z ) $.
$d x y z $.
